metadata.synopsis: Third Combat AD for Kerri's spirit during combat with the player. She wants to claim Oskar's spirit and take him back to the ethereal plane as punishment for bringing her back
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Go to CTY_Main_A -248; 30; -462) oe LOW_OskarsBeloved_CombatReadyKerriSpirit3) Third turn in combat with Kerri

0.speaker: Kerri Evenfield
0.text: Stay out of this. If I am Oskar's beloved, he will be mine.
0.context: NodeContext: Angry, aggressive - mid combat line. Aimed at the player this time, she'll kill you for getting in her way.
